00231 #define hwloc_bitmap_foreach_begin(id, bitmap) \
00232 do { \
00233         assert(hwloc_bitmap_weight(bitmap) != -1); \
00234         for (id = hwloc_bitmap_first(bitmap); \
00235              (unsigned) id != (unsigned) -1; \
00236              id = hwloc_bitmap_next(bitmap, id)) { \

00241 #define hwloc_bitmap_foreach_end() \
00242         } \
00243 } while (0)
